trans-unit.source: Specifies the states that can be applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement" /> for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.LoadedBehavior" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.UnloadedBehavior" /> properties.
trans-unit.target: 指定可套用至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.LoadedBehavior" /> 屬性之 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.UnloadedBehavior" /> 的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The state used to close the media.
All media resources are released (including video memory).
trans-unit.target: 所有媒體資源都會釋放 (包括視訊記憶體)。

trans-unit.source: The state used to control a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement" /> manually.
trans-unit.target: 用來手動控制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement" /> 的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Interactive methods like <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Play" /> and <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Pause" /> can be used.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用如 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Play" /> 和 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Pause" /> 之類的互動方法。

trans-unit.source: Media will preroll but not play when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement" /> is assigned valid media source.
trans-unit.target: 當指派有效媒體來源給 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement" /> 時，媒體將會預載但不會播放。

trans-unit.source: The state used to pause the media.
Media will preroll but remains paused when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement" /> is assigned valid media source.
trans-unit.target: 當指派有效媒體來源給 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement" /> 時，媒體將會預載但維持暫停狀態。

trans-unit.source: The state used to play the media.
Media will preroll automatically being playback when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement" /> is assigned valid media source.
trans-unit.target: 當指派有效媒體來源給 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement" /> 時，媒體將會預載並自動播放。

trans-unit.source: The state used to stop the media.
Media will preroll but not play when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement" /> is assigned valid media source.
trans-unit.target: 當指派有效媒體來源給 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement" /> 時，媒體將會預載但不會播放。
